source.source_name: UN SDG Goal 9: Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure
source.description: Sustainable Development Goal 9 (Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure) indicators from UN Statistics Division.

source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure
goal.full_title: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
goal.description: Goal 9 focuses on building resilient infrastructure, promoting inclusive and sustainable industrialization and fostering innovation. It addresses quality infrastructure, sustainable industrialization, access to financial services for small enterprises, technological capabilities, and research and development.

targets.text: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure to support economic development
Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and raise industry's share of employment and GDP
Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises to financial services
Upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable with increased resource-use efficiency
Enhance scientific research, upgrade technological capabilities of industrial sectors

key_indicators: NV_IND_MANFP - Manufacturing value added as proportion of GDP

metrics.ind_9_1_2: Container port traffic, maritime transport (twenty-foot equivalent units - TEUs)
metrics.ind_9_2_1: Manufacturing value added (constant 2015 United States dollars) as a proportion of GDP (%)
metrics.ind_9_2_2: Manufacturing employment as a proportion of total employment - 13th ICLS (%)
metrics.ind_9_3_1: Proportion of small-scale manufacturing industries in total manufacturing value added based on international classificat
metrics.ind_9_3_2: Proportion of small-scale industries with a loan or line of credit (%)
metrics.ind_9_4_1: Carbon dioxide emissions from fuel combustion (millions of tonnes)
metrics.ind_9_5_1: Research and development expenditure as a proportion of GDP (%)
metrics.ind_9_5_2: Researchers (in full-time equivalent) per million inhabitants (per 1,000,000 population)
metrics.ind_9_a_1: Total official flows for infrastructure, by recipient countries (millions of constant 2023 United States dollars)
metrics.ind_9_b_1: Proportion of medium and high-tech manufacturing value added in total value added (%)
metrics.ind_9_c_1: Proportion of population covered by at least a 2G mobile network (%)
